strategy: Emperor's Children armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Emperor's Children Core, Elite and Support formations, as well as the Chaos Thunderhawk, have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Emperor's Children, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Emperor's Children Retinue
formations.units: Three Noise Marines, three Chaos Space Marines, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

sections.name: Emperor's Children Elite Formations
sections.description: One Elite formation may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Emperor's Children Terminators
formations.units: Four Sirenshriek Terminators, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

sections.name: Emperor's Children Support Formations
sections.description: Two Support formations may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Bike Company
formations.units: Six Chaos Space Marine Assault Bikes, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

formations.name: Raptor Cult
formations.units: Four Raptors, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

sections.name: Dark Mechanicus Daemon Engines and Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Slaanesh Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to two Debasers for 50 points each

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Greater Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Greater Daemon Pool points. The first one is free.

upgrades.title: Emperor's Children Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace the Chaos Lord with a Warlord
Replace the Chaos Lord and its unit with a Daemon Prince of Slaanesh
Add up to three Chaos Rhinos
Add up to three Emperor's Children Land Raiders
(No more than needed to transport the formation with no space left over)

items.name: Terminator Transport
items.description: Add four Emperor's Children Land Raiders

items.name: Daemonic Pact
items.description: Add Daemonic Pact to the formation, and one point to the Lesser Daemon Pool

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add two Emperor's Children Dreadnoughts to the formation

items.name: Champion
items.description: Add one Champion of Slaanesh character to the formation

items.name: Stalker
items.description: Add one Chaos Stalker to the formation

items.name: Dreadclaws
items.description: Transport a formation containing only infantry units and Dreadnoughts in Dreadclaws (formation must be deployed on a space ship)

options.description: Replace three Chaos Space Marines with three Noise Marines
Replace three Chaos Space Marines with three Noise Marine Havocs
